data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Netrakona, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Netrakona, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Netrakona, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,793 believers in Netrakona to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,226,807 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, please give the people in the county of Netrakona access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kalu people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, make bold the prophets in Netrakona, Dhaka, Bangladesh so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,793 believers in Netrakona against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the county of Netrakona, Dhaka, Bangladesh has a population of 2,229,600.

We estimate Netrakona has 2,793 people who might know Jesus, 6,689 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,220,118 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Netrakona with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
